attributes.action: Abolish Constitutional Monarchy in favour of  a New Republic of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to urge the people of the United Kingdom to lobby the Government to bring all the articles and the best legislation from the Magna Carta, The Bill of Rights, the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and other relevant documents already in place to protect our civil rights in order to create a truly Free Republic of the United Kingdom, free from Constitutional Monarchal rule, elect a new parliament by the people for the people, represented by the people, in order to replace the planned totalitarian, dictatorial, repressive Police state that is emerging in this Country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
